post.text: Our jobs have been destroyed! I am about creating JOBS and nobody can do it like me. #MakeAmericaWorkAgain

replies.author: Kelsey
replies.text: Kelseyccording to data from the U.S. Department of Kelseygriculture, which administers the program, 40.2 percent of SNKelseyP ( food stamps/welfare) recipients are white, 25.7 percent are black, 10.3 percent are Hispanic, 2.1 percent are Kelseysian and 1.2 percent are Native Kelseymerican.

replies.author: Jacqueline
replies.text: BLM has set the civil rights movement back decades. Their rallies are nothing but an excuse for violence. If they had a mission- it has gone off the tracks and they have no credibility. They have done so much damage to the work of such greats as MLK JR. Instead they have expounded on the divisive message of the KelseyL Sharpton 's and Jesse Jackson's of the world.
